body.name: eufy Security Solar Wall Light Cam S120, Solar Security Camera, Wireless Outdoor, 2K Camera, Forever Power, Motion Activated Light, AI Detection, IP65 Waterproof, Spotlight, No Monthly Fee
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Amazon Warehouse and Fulfilled by Amazon.
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 14. Order within 2 hrs 46 mins
features: All-in-One Wall Light and Camera: A seamlessly integrated camera and light monitor the exterior of your home and illuminate spaces with 300 lumens of brightness. The light is comfortably bright, but won't disturb you or your neighbors at night. Plus, the light turns on automatically with motion activation.

Wireless Forever Power Solar Charging: With just 2 hours of sufficient sunlight, the integrated solar panel can supply more than a day's worth of power for the camera. The built-in battery provides up to 60 days of battery life when in energy-saving mode.

See 2K HD Day and Night: View the livestream and footage in full 2K HD color night vision, so you'll never miss a detail. Color Night Vision ensures recordings are vivid and sharp, even when the lights are off.

AI Smart Detection: The camera has a PIR sensor to detect motion 25 ft away and send you a real-time notification*. You can also use the eufy Security app to speak to people via two-way audio, sound the 105 dB siren, and activate bright lights to scare away intruders, wherever you are.
No Monthly Fee: eufy Wall Light Cam is a one-time purchase with no monthly fee or hidden costs. Stores event footage locally for up to 60 days.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Previous page Harness the Sun's Power Just 2 hours* of adequate sunlight per day can keep Solar Wall Light Cam powered continuously. Capture Every Detail Live streams and recordings are in full 2K HD detail, so it's easy to see every detail. Stick, Light, Watch Install in 5 minutes, no wiring involved, and no further maintenance required. Clear Recordings at Night Color Night Vision ensures recordings are vivid and sharp. Comfortable Level of Light The 300-lumen dimmable light and 4,000K color temperature gives cozy illumination for nighttime use. Next page 1 Forever Power 2 Full 2K HD 3 Easy Installation 4 Color Night Vision 5 Comfortable Lighting

Previous page Motion-Activated Light The light and camera automatically switch on when motion is detected up to 25 ft away. Save and Share Footage Store event footage locally for up to 2 months, plus download and share videos with others. Set Activity Zones Set up to 2 activity zones to cover the most vital areas of home. Only receive alerts that matter. Real-Time Communication Listen and talk to someone from anywhere through the eufy Security app. Next page 1 Motion Activation 2 2 Months of Storage 3 Detection Zones 4 Two-Way Audio

Control via eufy Security App Control eufy Solar Wall Light Cam via the app. Turn lights on or off, get notifications, use two-way audio, and more, from anywhere. Alexa and the Google Assistant Compatible with Alexa and the Google Assistant for hands-free lighting and monitoring. IP65 Weather Resistant eufy Solar Wall Light Cam stays tough in various weather conditions, including rain, snow, and fog. No Hidden Costs eufy Solar Wall Light Cam is a one-time purchase with no monthly fees or hidden costs.

Technical Specifications Product Name Solar Wall Light Cam S120 Brand eufy Security Product Dimensions 6.7×4.9×2.7 inches (L×W×H) / 170×125×69 mm(L×W×H) Net Weight 1.01 lb (0.45 kg) Main Material PC Mount Type Wall Mount, Recommended Set-up Height 71-98 inches (1.8-2.5m) Power Source Solar Power and Built-In Battery (5,200mAh) Connectivity 802.11 b/g/n 2.4GHz Wi-Fi Lighting Brightness Up to 300 Lumens, Adjustable Color Temperature 4,000K Lighting mode Motion Activated Lighting, Always On Mode not Supported Camera 2K Resolution (2304×1296), Infrared and Color Night Vision, 120° Field of View Storage 8GB eMMC Inside AI and Voice Assistant Human Detection AI, Support Alexa and Google Assistant Audio and Siren Two-Way-Audio, 105 dB Siren Weatherproof IP65, Operating Condition -4°F-122°F (-20°C-50°C)

Meet eufy Wall Light Cam Family Solar Wall Light Cam S120 Wired Wall Light Cam S100 Wall Light Cam S100 (2-Pack） Power Source Solar Power and Built-In Battery (5,200mAh) Power Source Standard Power Outlet, 110~240V AC Power Source Standard Power Outlet, 110~240V AC Camera 2K Resolution (2304×1296), Infrared and Color Night Vision, 120° Field of View Camera 2K Resolution (2048×1536), Infrared and Color Night Vision, 160° Field of View Camera 2K Resolution (2048×1536), Infrared and Color Night Vision, 160° Field of View Lighting Brightness and Color Up to 300 Lumens, Adjustable; 4,000K Color Temperature Lighting Brightness and Color Up to 1,200 Lumens, Adjustable; Almost 1,000,000 Colors to Customized Lighting Brightness and Color Up to 1,200 Lumens, Adjustable; Almost 1,000,000 Colors to Customized Storage 8GB eMMC Inside Storage 4GB eMMC Inside, Capable to link to a HomeBase 3 to Expand Storage Up to 16TB Storage 4GB eMMC Inside, Capable to link to a HomeBase 3 to Expand Storage Up to 16TB Weatherproof IP65 Weatherproof IP65 Weatherproof IP65

Is Solar Wall Light Cam S120 compatible with Apple HomeKit? Apple HomeKit is not currently supported. Alexa and the Google Assistant are supported. How efficient is the built-in solar charging? Tests show that with exposure to direct sunlight for 2 hours, S120 can work for an entire day and night. This depends on a lot of factors including the sunlight strength. Please install S120 in good position to receive as much sunlight as possible. Do I need to drill holes to install Solar Wall Light Cam? Yes, drilling holes is necessary to install Solar Wall Light Cam S120. Using the included mounting bracket and screws is the most reliable mounting method. Can I keep the light on even when no motion is detected? Solar Wall Light Cam S120 does not support always-on lighting. This is because the product is solely powered wirelessly by a 5,200 mAh battery, and keeping the light on constantly would quickly reduce the battery life. How long will Solar Wall Light Cam S120 last without solar charging？ The battery capacity of Solar Wall Light Cam S120 is 5,200 mAh, which can power it for around 2 months of average use in energy saving mode.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Eufy Security Solar Wall Light Cam S120
reviews.reviewText: One of the best outdoor cameras on the market.First impression - camera is bigger then I expected. But on other hand it should be bigger than some other outdoor cameras to have more space for solar batteries. Easy to install, very good night and day video quality, internal memory is 7Gb - can store a lot of video files.My house is located in the shade and in front of it is a big tree - not the perfect place to install this camera. Even in this so so conditions camera was working just fine. In three weeks battery discharged to 50%. Removed, charged batteries, placed camera back. There is also a choice to buy and connect additional solar charger.It will be a good idea to have ability to adjust lenses angle about 5-10 degree up and down. In my case about 5 degree down.Microphone is too sensitive, getting some background audio noise.Overall, this a perfect outdoor camera.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just what I wanted
reviews.reviewText: The camera works great and notifies me instantly that a person is walking by. Crystal clear video! And no one would ever know that it's a camera as it looks like just a typical solar wedge light. Simple installation. Well pleased!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good for garage doorway monitoring
reviews.reviewText: Already bought several Eufy security cameras and are fairly happy with them. Bought this one to monitor pathways in front of garage door also as night night. Captures video as expected and charged itself thru solar panel. But quality of the image is a lot lower then the others but still a good product for the price. So far worked as expected but the battery life drained to less than 40% the last couple days due to rainy and cloudy. Hope it charged itself backup

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Completely worth it! So easy to install! So far the battery life hasn't gone down at all!
reviews.reviewText: Your worries for security cameras that are wireless are normally battery life and detection. So far I have had no issues with this at all. Took only a few minutes to install after the initial charge, and it's been great. You can adjust the range of detection on the camera by clicking and dragging so even though I caught a tiny sliver of the street in the camera view, I can move the line over so that it doesn't go off when a car drives by. It's got sound and motion, human and pet detection. I love eufy cameras and was so glad to find this easy to install option for my front entryway outside.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars It Has Charging Issues ✨️
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. FINAL UPDATE: It has battery charging issues. I plugged it in to charge. I charged it to 100%. I mounted an external solar panel that is 100% in direct sunlight all day long. Its in a new position and it charged fine for a week or two then went back to having charging issues. It will not charge properly. Removed the solar panel and its the same thing. Charges correctly for awhile then stops. They need to reprogram the charging state. It seems after a few cycles it slow charges taking all day just to charge 1% if that. Something is also draining the battery according to their battery status idicator on the app. 🤔 Not motion detection not live view it just says other. What is it? Is it busy sending data to some nefarious entity?The motion sensitivity also stays in the middle setting now. It won't change. The light no longer works with motion. It flashes and will not stay on nor will it record. A security camera that doesn't record. 🤨 It lasted 2 months before the problems started. 😐 Can't recommend it. Too many bugs.UPDATE 2: Interesting. I placed the camera in direct sunlight without the external solar panel and it didn't charge. The 2nd day I turned the sensitivity down to the middle position and at high noon it started to charge. Whatha? ... Going to try this again to see if increasing the sensitivity is why it's not charging. Tried turning it off and nothing. So it may be the sensitivity. ... 🤔UPDATE: Not ready for prime time solar charging. I purchased the Eufy solar panel to use with this since it's winter time and it wasn't in direct sunlight. The battery still drained faster than it could charge even when you turn off the camera. I thought the problem was not being in direct sunlight so I took it down charged it up placed it in direct sunlight and it still drains way faster than it can charge.I went through problem solving 4 times charging it moving it etc. It seems the problem is the camera. It worked great for a week or two then the charging problems occurred. It just won't charge. 2 months out and this has become annoying to have to take it down every few days to wall charge. 🫤 It seems to not last. The charger or battery or both are not working the way it should. Also having less severe but similar issues with another Eufy solar cam. 🤕 It seems to drain about 2% every hour and only charges 1.5% for the whole day. 🤨 It dropped from 100% to 84% in direct sunlight the whole time. Simply put after 2 weeks it does not charge properly. Save yourself the $50 for an external solar panel that Eufy sells because it won't help. There seems to be a problem with the recharging hardware and or battery they use. 🤔 Judging by the number of people having the same issue this is not reliable and needs work. I lost a $150 this camera and solar panel. Save your money until they fix the issue.ORIGINAL REVIEW: I like this camera it's solar powered with good image quality and the low light performance is way better than blink. In this video clip the light was off and the image was still clear. 👌Love the fact it's all in one. No separate module to buy no memory stick needed no replacement batteries to purchase every few months and NO SUBSCRIPTION FEES! 😎The sensitivity is good picking up people walking about 75+ft away. The clips load up way faster than blink. The price is also reasonable.Let's talk about why it's not 5 stars. It started out recording cars and people from almost one side of the screen to the other giving a full recording of an event. But after a short while it starts mid way. 🤨 So you're not getting a full or early enough detection. It's too slow to start recording and you're only seeing half of an event. 😐 It's probably easy to correct with an update because like I said when I 1st got it it recorded fully.The audio needs work. You can barely hear anything unless its right in front of the camera but there isn't much noise like Blink cameras. Some of the sound is articially sounding like a digital chop. But it picks up dogs n birds super clear. 😵‍💫 Even though you turn off the status light there's a blue circle light always on. I want all power to the camera. Most people think it's just an LED light.They need a quick photo button to update the thumbnail so you can take a photo without going into the live feed. The POV could be a little wider and the zoom needs to be able to stay put. You can double tap and it zooms. Double tap again and it gets more zoomed but if you wanna go more you need to do the 2 finger stretch but as soon as you let go it bounces back to the last zoom. It doesn't stay all the way zoomed. 🤔 When you zoom all the way it is pretty blocky n pixelated but the onboard preset zooms are pretty clear.During playback I can't FF or RW you can only pause n play and when you unpause it starts playback from the beginning starting all over. 🥴 I want to be able to scan. I also want the ability to turn the light on without going into the live feed. When reviewing clips the clip you select needs to be highlighted so you know where you're at on the clips review screen so I know my place where I left off.Now about the solar panel. It does charge not being in direct sunlight but that charge is not faster than it drains. So it slowly drains the camera and you will need to take it down to recharge. No matter what some say you need to have this in direct sunlight or get a separate solar panel. This camera's battery drains even if you turn it off. 🤔If you can place this in direct sunlight you probably won't have charging issues. In my case the sun is behind me so I needed an external solar panel so I can keep this above my garage door.Blink started to charge a subscription fee bait n switching on people and over pricing their new camera. Their new 4th gen is still only 1080p where this is 2K. 🫵😎👍 Bye bye Blink. 👋

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good security setup
reviews.reviewText: Bought lthesie for the sides of the house that do not have windows. Cameras work good. They pick up motion with pretty good quality. Nice feature is ability to black out portions of picture that infringe on neighbors privacy. Lights are good but not very bright. Solar seems to work since I haven't had to charge. Overall very happy with this purchase.
Super clear images, and a bright light at night.
Buenas opciones de configuración, buena calidad de vídeo y audio, el único problema es que no tiene entrada para tarjeta sd.

The camera has good video images and works at night even without the light being enabled. The light is a nice feature though as it then gives you a colour image at night. I have it installed in an area where it won't get very much sun light during the winter months, but the battery seems to last a long time. After 2.5 weeks it is down to 69%. It does charge a small amount each day, but I will likely have to recharge a few times over the long winter.

I love the fact that this camera recharges itself from the sunlight allowing for maintenance free operation. I only wish that the 120° Field of View was 170° instead, which would be better for my needs of installing only 1 camera on each side of my home.

reviews.reviewTitle: Update, faulty unit was refunded immediately, great customer service.
reviews.reviewText: Battery drains quickly & solar charging can't keep up. Manual charging required weekly. Disappointing!Update: Faulty unit was refund immediately, great customer service, buy with confidence.
